title: Jonny Wilkinson: how I'm staying fit at 40 – and finally learning to enjoy exercise
text:
The Rugby World Cup winner reveals how turning 40 inspired him to start treating the gym as a ‘playground’ and commit to a new clean and green midlife diet

Something has changed about Jonny Wilkinson. The man whose obsessive attention to detail helped England win the Rugby World Cup some 16 years ago is talking to me about his midlife health regime, and he seems… oddly relaxed. Not with answering my questions – Wilkinson’s conversation is as earnest and involved as ever, betraying a mind that habitually analyses everything to the nth degree – but with his very approach to staying in shape.

“When I go to the gym today I tend to just see what grabs me,” he says, with unrecognisable nonchalance....
description: The Rugby World Cup winner reveals how turning 40 inspired him to start treating the gym as a ‘playground’ and commit to a new clean and green midlife diet
